description: This Dart file defines a ChangeNotifier class 'HistoryProvider' that manages call history entries for a video calling app. It interacts with a data store to retrieve, add, and update call history data, serving as a state management component in a Flutter application.

classes.name: HistoryProvider
classes.description: A provider class that maintains and exposes a list of call history entries, allowing for starting and ending call entries, and notifying listeners of changes.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Fetches all call history entries from the store and updates the internal list.

methods.name: startEntry
methods.description: Creates a new call history entry with specified room ID and participants, inserts it into the store, and refreshes the local list.

methods.name: endEntry
methods.description: Marks the ongoing call entry as ended with the specified outcome, updates it in the store, and refreshes the list.
